stream_context.summary: Kaze livestreams while re-designing a red-coin side-area, fixing a crash, and talking through plans for “Quest 13,” a mountaintop ice-castle.  Much of the time is spent adjusting geometry, textures, lighting and debugging an S8-register bug.  Chat (Biobak, Lilaa, Zeina) give feedback on visual style, Wild-West signage and texture ideas.

development_findings.summary: Fixed a hard crash caused by an optimisation that stored the current-object pointer in the FP/S8 register; swimming code overwrote S8.  He removed S8 from the function, eliminating the crash.
development_findings.quote: By my calculations, we should now be rid of the crash.

development_findings.summary: Quest 13 will be an ice-castle on a mountain: bright, desaturated blues, ‘scary but not dark’, outside sections with snow, fog and possible Aurora Borealis.  Influenced by Hollow Root Keep in The Missing Link.
development_findings.quote: It was gonna be white and desaturated blues… pretty bright, but it would be scary and gloomy.

development_findings.summary: An old 8-red-coin area was deemed boring and is being rebuilt: fewer waits, better camera, moving brick platforms, coin placement tweaked so casual players can reach them.
development_findings.quote: We’re just remaking one area of an old level because I watched play-testers play it and I realized this area fucking sucks.

development_findings.summary: Wild-West course signage added: ‘Tumbleweed Store’, ‘Koopa Bank’, and ‘Milk Bar’.  Zeina provided the art; textures need proper N64 sizes.
development_findings.quote: This is a pretty good sign… definitely looks like a tumbleweed store here.

development_findings.summary: Engine will be released as open source once the project ships.
development_findings.quote: Will the engine be open source? Yes it will be.

development_findings.summary: Waiting on Sauraen’s final decisions for F3DX3 and RQIA before moving forward.
development_findings.quote: I’m still waiting for Sauraen to make the final decisions on that.

development_findings.summary: Video about invisible walls is live; Kaze reiterates his design rule: avoid death floors below main play-space to keep Banjo-Tooie-style exploration.
development_findings.quote: Have you guys played Mario 64 crossed with Banjo-Tooie? You would know why we don’t just put a death floor below the level.

development_findings.summary: Lighting palette across courses has been mapped (light/dark/sunset) to avoid monotony; current level’s flames and fog are tuned to fit that scheme.
development_findings.quote: Light, light, dark, sunset, dark… How do you see so many sunsets?

context_findings.summary: Kaze emphasises fitness: daily workouts, 243 lb bench, 500 lb deadlift; currently nursing a knee injury.
context_findings.quote: I work out like almost every day… my bench one-rep max is almost as much as my squat.

context_findings.summary: Philosophy of open debate: deliberately says things wrong to be corrected; enjoys political discussion on stream.
context_findings.quote: If you want a question answered you shouldn’t ask the question, you should just say something wrong and wait for someone to correct you.

context_findings.summary: Personal haircut mishap: wife Zeina accidentally shaved a strip, forcing a military cut.
context_findings.quote: The front thing of the clippers came off and she just kept going… so we had to cut it short.

context_findings.summary: Reflects on meat-eating ethics; thinks future generations will see it as immoral but still eats meat.
context_findings.quote: In a few years, people that eat meat… will be looked at as the worst people ever. I still eat meat though.

context_findings.summary: Skeptical of doctors; prefers self-directed physiotherapy after bad experiences with pain-killer prescriptions.
context_findings.quote: Every time I go to a doctor it gets worse, so I do not go to doctors anymore.

biobak.summary: Provided feedback on Wild-West lighting (‘sunset’ debate) and suggested texturing changes to moving brick platforms.
biobak.quote: You’re getting roasted by Biobak, Lila.

zeina.summary: Created new Wild-West course signs (Tumbleweed Store, Koopa Bank, Milk Bar) and continues texture work upstairs during the stream.
zeina.quote: Zaina just did a sign for a tumbleweed store… the milk bar sign is really good.

zeina.summary: Accidentally botched Kaze’s haircut while clipping, leading to his current short hair.
zeina.quote: Because my wife fucked up my haircut… so we had to cut it short.

key_stories.title: S8 Register Crash
key_stories.summary: A new side-area crashed whenever Mario hit a wall because swimming code overwrote S8, which Kaze’s optimisation used for the current-object pointer.
key_stories.challenge: Game would ‘randomly’ crash on entry or wall-hit.
key_stories.process: Identified S8 usage conflict; re-compiled with reduced register pressure, eliminating S8.
key_stories.key_quote: Okay, by my calculations, we should now be rid of the crash.

key_stories.title: Red-Coin Area Overhaul
key_stories.summary: Play-test footage showed an old red-coin mission was tedious.  Kaze scraps it and builds a new space with smoother slides, easier camera and decorative flames.
key_stories.challenge: Original mission ‘fucking sucks’: waiting, bad camera, awkward vines.
key_stories.process: Demolished section, rebuilt geometry, re-placed coins, added moving brick platforms and fog.
key_stories.outcome: Visually fresher, mechanically tighter area nearly finished.
key_stories.key_quote: We’re just remaking one area of an old level because… this area fucking sucks.

key_stories.title: Ice-Castle Concept (Quest 13)
key_stories.summary: Next main level after current tasks will be a mountaintop ice castle inspired by Hollow Root Keep.
key_stories.challenge: Need a fresh thematic level distinct from prior dark stages.
key_stories.process: Brainstormed color palette (white/desaturated blue), ambience (bright yet suspenseful), exterior Aurora and fog.
key_stories.outcome: Clear visual direction; boss still undecided.
key_stories.key_quote: Quest 13 is going to be an ice castle on top of a mountain… very gloomy and scary and dark—or maybe more suspenseful.

key_stories.title: Haircut Mishap
key_stories.summary: Zeina accidentally shaved a bald line into Kaze’s hair while clipping.
key_stories.process: Cut the rest very short to hide the strip.
key_stories.outcome: Kaze appears with ‘military cut’ tank-top look; becomes chat topic.
key_stories.key_quote: She was using the clippers and the front came off… now there was a whole bald line.
